div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1141 Myrmecium (mod. Cape Karantin), just N of Kerch', Crimea Oblast, Ukraine, 1937 Burial: 90-80 B.C. (Imhoof-Blumer) Contents: 6 AE. In burial Amisus: (as RGA I.1, pl. 7, 14-16) Disposition: Leningrad Kharko, MIA 25 (1952), p. 361 Zograph, MIA 25 (1952), p. 378, nos. 2552-7
